title: Notice Me Senpai!!! Why I"m sad, as a suppport
body:
There are some things that get me down sometimes being supp main...
Most of the time I see 90% of everything that happens on the map and always make sure to tell my team mates GJ and complement them for any great plays. It's good to receive complements back too sometimes!!! Am i the only one who feels supports are under appreciated esp at low elo... Peeling is something i pride myself in doing a lot. But like after the end of the game we win and the conversation with my adc kind of goes like this
Me: you did rlly goood that game 
Adc: thnx
Me: wbmeeeee, did i do a good job peeling the last few fights?
Adc: u didnt do anything. I carried.
Me: WTF..lol
Adc: Jk, i d k. I just focus on kiting and atking whos in front of me. I dont rlly focus on anything else happening around me so idk.
*Now im like WTF even after I ulty to save u, stunned everyone around u, used mikaels and locket to save ur *** -u notice NOTHING???

It's sad not getting noticed by senpai!

replies.body: I feel like a support also unfortunately has the role of "babysitting" the other players. If Jimmy and Todd get into an argument about who gets blue buff, support is there to sort things out. If Jeremy doesn't notice a bush is warded and tries ganking from it, support is their with a danger ping.
The unsung heroes of soloq. Also, first!

support is the most important and most underappreciated role.
the things you do as support have the most impact but are not flashy or easily noticeable.
Yea... we are like a motherly role that no one notices or appreciates. In fact i declare there should be a Support's Day ! or something. :D
